titleStmt.title: The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie. By D. Andrewes Deane of Wesminster. VI. April 1604
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

titleStmt.title: The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie. By D. Andrewes Deane of Wesminster. VI. April 1604
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [E. Griffin for] Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Sermons, without a general title page. In four parts. Part 1 reprints STC 597, 596, 616, 612, 613, 620, and 622 on continuous signatures, with only the last subsidiary title page dated; parts 2-4 are reissues of STC 624, 623, and 611 and retain their imprints--STC.
Title and imprint from first sermon. Printer's name and actual publication date from STC.
Each sermon in part 1 has a separate title page naming Robert Barker as the printer. That on x1r is dated 1618; the rest are undated.
"The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie" identified as STC 595a on UMI microfilm reel 866.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Appears at reel 866 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1676 (University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy).
Reel 866: only "The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie" and title page to "Concio Latin√®" are filmed.
